definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: Thus neuroses are the negative of perversions.
sentences.chinese: 如此神經症就是性倒錯的消極形式。

sentences.english: And the action is futile, because it is simply the occupation of a neurotic mind.
sentences.chinese: 那種行動是徒勞的，因爲它只是神經症的頭腦的佔領。

sentences.english: Method Apply self-made Jieyu Tang to 84 cases of depressive neurosis.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用自擬解鬱湯治療抑鬱性神經症84例。

sentences.english: Maslow felt that psychoanalysis and its emphasis on neuroses had its place.
sentences.chinese: 馬斯洛認爲，精神分析和神經症強調了它的位置。

sentences.english: The pathological material I am here presupposing is pure psychoneurosis.
sentences.chinese: 我在這裏假定的病理資料，是純粹心理神經症患者。

sentences.english: Conclusion Self-made Jieyu Tang has good therapeutic effect on depressive neurosis.
sentences.chinese: 結論自擬解鬱湯治療抑鬱性神經症療效顯著。

sentences.english: He may have some kind of neurosis or psychosis later in life.
sentences.chinese: 他晚年可能患有某種神經症或精神病。

sentences.english: Conclusion The access of geriatric neurosis relates to the psychic - social factor closely.
sentences.chinese: 結論老年期神經症的發生與心理社會因素密切相關。

sentences.english: In neurosis cause the most easily with angst sex neurosis impotent.
sentences.chinese: 神經症中則以焦慮性神經症最易引起陽痿。

sentences.english: In neurosis cause the most easily with angst sex neurosis impotent.
sentences.chinese: 神經症中則以焦慮性神經症最易引起陽痿。

sentences.english: Conclution There are changes of the REM indices in the depressive neuroses.
sentences.chinese: 結論抑鬱性神經症具有快動眼睡眠指標改變。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate outpatient Morita therapy on the efficacy of neurosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討門診森田療法對神經症的療效。

sentences.english: This kind of expression does not belong to hypochondriasis sex neurosis.
sentences.chinese: 這類表現則不屬於疑病性神經症。

sentences.english: The different diseases were significantly different according to the cluster of MMPI factors.
sentences.chinese: 不同神經症在聚類後的MMPI四類因子上差異顯著。

sentences.english: ConclusionTrazodone is a safe and efficient drug for anxiety neurosis.
sentences.chinese: 結論曲唑酮治療焦慮性神經症安全有效，副作用小。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects of light quantum blood therapy on neurosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究光量子血療對神經症的治療作用。
